name: Pauline McKNIGHT, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA CRIME VICTIM'S COMPENSATION BOARD
name_abbreviation: McKnight v. Commonwealth, Pennsylvania Crime Victim's Compensation Board

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDER-MOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: Pauline McKNIGHT, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA CRIME VICTIM’S COMPENSATION BOARD.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed, 76 Pa.Cmwlth. 274, 463 A.2d 1238, as having been improvidently granted.
NIX, C.J., LARSEN, J., dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Michael N. Borish, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Gregory R. Neuhauser, Deputy Atty. Gen., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
482 A.2d 1274
Pauline McKNIGHT, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA CRIME VICTIM’S COMPENSATION BOARD.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 24, 1984.
Decided Nov. 5, 1984.
Michael N. Borish, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Gregory R. Neuhauser, Deputy Atty. Gen., for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDER-MOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
